features.title: Content Restriction
features.name: User Registration - Content Restriction
features.excerpt: Content Restriction addon allows you to restrict full or partial content from page, post to only logged in users or logged in users with specific roles.

features.title: PayPal Payment
features.name: User Registration Payments
features.excerpt: Integrates PayPal into your forms for registration fee payments, donations, and more. set either predefined, user defined or hidden amount on the form as per the requirement.

features.title: Frontend Listing
features.name: User Registration Frontend Listing
features.excerpt: The Frontend Listing addon for User Registration allows you to list your users in frontend. Users and guests can view and check profile of all the members listed on the site.
